mortality.note: UN documented ~5,000 killed, 10,000+ women/girls enslaved. 400,000+ displaced. Yazidis call it '74th Ferman' (decree) - referencing 74 historical persecutions.

rationales.systematic_intensity: ISIS systematic: mass executions of men, sexual slavery of women, forced conversion.
rationales.profit: Slave trade, property seizure, but ideology primary.
rationales.ideology: Extreme jihadism. Yazidis as 'devil worshippers' requiring elimination.
rationales.complicity: Local Sunni Arabs sometimes collaborated. International coalition slow to respond.

analysis.pattern_note: ISIS explicitly targeted Yazidis as 'devil worshippers'. Sexual slavery systematized with religious justification. Nadia Murad (survivor) won Nobel Peace Prize 2018. Despite relatively low death toll, meets genocide criteria through intent to destroy group via enslavement and forced conversion.
analysis.root_causes: ISIS jihadism, religious intolerance, state collapse in Iraq/Syria

sources.title: They Came to Destroy: ISIS Crimes Against the Yazidis
sources.author: UN Human Rights Council
